gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all cluster groups to manage virtualization resources.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of cluster groups with details such as name, description, and associated clusters.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new cluster group for organizing virtual clusters.
gold.ideal: Creates a new cluster group and returns the details of the created group including its ID.

gold.user: System administrator updating the configuration of an existing cluster group.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified cluster group and returns the updated details.

gold.user: IT manager retrieving a list of all virtual clusters for reporting.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of virtual clusters with their statuses, resources, and configurations.

gold.user: DevOps engineer deleting an obsolete virtual cluster from the system.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the specified cluster and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: Cloud architect provisioning a new virtual machine for a development environment.
gold.ideal: Creates a new virtual machine and returns its configuration details including ID and status.

gold.user: System administrator updating the memory allocation for a specific virtual machine.
gold.ideal: Partially updates the specified virtual machine and returns the updated configuration.

gold.user: Storage administrator reviewing all virtual disks to optimize storage usage.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of virtual disks with details such as size, type, and associated virtual machines.

gold.user: Network administrator removing multiple unused virtual interfaces from the system.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the specified interfaces and returns a confirmation of the operation.

gold.user: Developer generating a render configuration for a virtual machine for deployment.
gold.ideal: Creates a render configuration for the specified virtual machine and returns the configuration details.
